shipping_costs.response_template: Shipping is structured into our pricing model. The landed cost is what matters — and on these brands, the math works.

need_samples.response_template: We can discuss a trial structure on the call. Most partners start focused and scale from there.

returns_policy.response_template: We structure initial orders around proven sellers in your category. The brands we'd recommend have strong sell-through data. Happy to walk through the specifics.

need_approval.response_template: Of course. Happy to include them on the call — sometimes it's easier to evaluate together. I can send a calendar invite for all parties.

already_stocked.response_template: Good — then you know the demand. The question is whether you're getting the best sourcing terms on them. That's worth a 30-minute comparison.

too_many_brands.response_template: Understood. We're not adding complexity — we consolidate sourcing across multiple brands through one relationship. That's the value.

cash_flow.response_template: The brands we source at 45-70% off retail actually improve cash position — your per-unit cost drops significantly. Worth looking at the numbers together.

slow_season.response_template: That's actually ideal timing to evaluate sourcing before your next buying cycle ramps up. Easier to plan when you're not in the thick of it.

legal_concerns.response_template: Valid concern. Our sourcing is structured and we can walk through the supply chain details on a call. It's the first thing serious partners want to verify.

website_only.response_template: Most of our e-commerce partners see strong margins on these brands. The online channel is actually where the velocity is highest.

small_business.response_template: We work across all sizes. Some of our best partners started with a focused initial order and scaled. It's about the category fit, not the volume.

send_email_info.response_template: Happy to share specifics — the most efficient way is a quick 30-minute walkthrough where I can tailor the information to your business. More useful than a generic PDF.
